# Personal info

We value your privacy and do not collect personal information beyond server
logs for operational purposes.

We do not
knowingly collect personal information from children.

back to top

# How we collect info

Our service collects data through server logs whenever you interact with our
endpoints.

We do not store personal information for any longer
than necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.
sharing:
It is not used for personal profiling
or shared with third parties for marketing purposes.

back to top

# When we share your info

We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.

Information may be
shared only in specific circumstances, as outlined below.

## Our Partners

We may share aggregated, non-personal information with our partners to improve
service offerings.

## Legal process

In certain legal circumstances, we may be required to disclose your
information in response to lawful requests by public authorities, including to
meet national security or law enforcement requirements.
